text: @JoeBiden Hey Pedo Joe, didn't you know...they slashed the Covid-19 death count in HALF. why you ask? Bc the numbers were inflated...kind of like your ego. Will the Pedo please step down. You have ZERO CHANCE of EVER being president of the USA 🇺🇸..maybe president of the pedo club..maybe.
